projects.title: SENSEI – AI Tutor Platform
projects.subtitle: RAG-Based AI System
description: One-to-one AI tutoring platform built using a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture.
Uses semantic search to retrieve relevant context and generate accurate, grounded responses.
Designed and implemented the RAG pipeline using LlamaIndex and Qdrant with a scalable FastAPI backend.

projects.title: LiftMyMind
projects.subtitle: Mental Health Support Platform
description: Mental health support platform designed to help users manage anxiety, depression, and stress.
Features a well-being survey that calculates a depression score and recommends personalized music playlists.
Focused on calm UI design, smooth animations, and an emotionally supportive user experience.

projects.title: E-Commerce Backend Platform
projects.subtitle: Scalable Backend System
description: Developed a scalable backend system for an e-commerce platform using Django and MySQL.
Includes admin management for products, users, orders, and categories.
Implemented PDF report generation for sales and order analytics.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.subtitle: Interactive CLI Interface
description: Built an interactive, keyboard-driven terminal portfolio using React and Ink.
Implemented smooth keyboard navigation with arrow keys to explore different sections.
Designed visually engaging CLI output using gradient text and ASCII banners.
Structured the application into modular sections including About, Projects, Skills, and Contact.
Provided a seamless developer experience with simple installation and execution steps.
